descriptor.name: Soil Health Card Scheme Assignment
descriptor.short_desc: Assignment: Guide a farmer through the Soil Health Card application and document the process.
descriptor.long_desc:
Assignment Overview:
This assignment requires you to apply your knowledge of the Soil Health Card (SHC) scheme by simulating or assisting a farmer in obtaining and understanding their Soil Health Card. Document each step, from eligibility check to application and interpretation of the card.

  1. Task:
    Guide a real or hypothetical farmer through the SHC application process, ensuring all requirements are met.
  2. Documentation:
    Record the steps, challenges, and solutions. Include forms or screenshots if possible.
  3. Reflection:
    Write a brief reflection on the importance of soil health and what you learned from this assignment.

Why Complete This Assignment:

  • Reinforce your practical knowledge of SHC procedures.
  • Develop the ability to assist others in accessing agricultural schemes.
  • Prepare for real-world scenarios as a community facilitator or agri-advisor.

descriptor.name: Haqdarshak
descriptor.short_desc: A social enterprise connecting citizens with their eligible government welfare schemes.
descriptor.long_desc: Haqdarshak is a tech platform that bridges the information and access gap between citizens and social protection services. We use an assisted-tech model with trained agents to provide last-mile support for discovering and applying for government and private welfare schemes.
